text: The Star magazine cover story claiming Ellen has dumped Portia, which has stunned US fans. Star magazine ( US ) When the talk show queen spent a whopping US $ 20 million on a luxury, beach - front, mansion in the sleepy Californian town of Carpinteria, everyone assumed it was just another notch on her property belt. However, according to reports in Star magazine, Ellen bought the pad because she was in desperate need of somewhere to escape her troubled marriage to Portia. “ Ellen bought the house right after she had a huge blowout with Portia, ” a source told the publication, claiming that a recent argument at their Beverley Hills home being “ their worst fight yet ”.
